features: HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS : The folding washing machine is made of environmentally friendly materials. It is safe, non-toxic, and tasteless. And is durable. Can bear about 1 kg of clothing weight.Adopting low noise design, no worrying disturbing your rest or sleeping.

ULTRASONIC CLEANING : This product of ours uses high-frequency vibration cavitation to accelerate the dispersion of the liquid, which can clean the turbine forward and backward to achieve the purpose of cleaning.It has a powerful suction cup, so there is no need to worry about shaking. Very effective in washing clothes.

LIGHT AND PORTABLE : Diameter-9CM/3.54; Weight-300g, can be carried in a pocket or handbag.Suitable for those who cant use large machines,like travel and trips.This washing machine can only wash underwear or light and small objects, please do not use to wash heavy clothes such as jeans, coats, etc.
ENERGY SAVING : Energy saving, environmental protection, water and electricity saving.Our portable washing machines not only save a third of water, but also save a lot of power than washing machines.

EASY TO USE : Once you set up washer to suitable bucket w/water, add your personal laundry and preferred detergent. Plug in and press the power button to on remote to begin auto circ.Carefully rubbing like hands, no hurt to clothing.The washing machine first cleans the turbine for 2 minutes, followed by 1.5 minutes of ultrasonic vibration cleaning, and then performs bubbling cleaning for 5 minutes, repeating for about 30 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultrasonic Multifunctional Portable Washing Machines FEATURE： 1.This product is very suitable for personal laundry during travel, especially undergarments,socks, baby clothes,and it does't twist clothes.Fast and effective cleaning ability is your first choice.The washing machine is convenient to use and store. 2.The simple and easy-to-operate method can be carried at any time, and it is the best choice for many business travelers and students. 3.The washing machine is suitable for light personal clothing, light and small clothing, very suitable for business travelers, students, etc. 4.The low power consumption small washing machine is very suitable for camping, apartment, dormitory, RV and business trip.

This portable mini washing machine is an independent washing machine chassis.which can be directly hung on the wall of the bucket and placed at the bottom of the bucket!alternate cleaning, simulating manual cleaning.360-degree water flushing, using innovative vortex rod eddy current and super shock wave interactive dual cleaning mode. Go beyond hand washing and reduce detergent residue. Portable Ultrasonic Washing Machine are the best way to clean your precious little baby clothes. It is also ideal to wash diapers hygienically outside the home washing machine. It is a mini washer only for small items, cleaning large products may damage the machine, saving space and to carry. Easy to use, saving more electricity and water. The mini washing machine is small in size and light in weight. You can put it in your suitcase when you travel or travel, it won't take up too much space in your suitcase, and it is easy to carry.The bucket turns into a washing machine bucket in seconds, which is suitable for most buckets. It takes up almost no space on the balcony and bathroom. Restore hand washing, go beyond hand washing.

Washing vegetables, fruits and dirty dishes, it is the best choice for housewives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I tried waking like 3 or 4 pair of very lightweight panties with this and the thing could not keep up...it kept stopping and getting jammed with the closing. I bought this to wash my un-mentionables for a small load. No good...do not but. Waste of money. 1 star cause I had to. Otherwise no stars in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got despite the reviews and am pleased I did, works great for dishes
reviews.reviewText: This and all the similar gadgets have some pretty bad reviews but I was desperate and don't want to spend $400 on a counter top dishwasher right now. So I took a chance, not expecting much and this turned out to be a good decision.I filled the container I have with a bunch of small but very dirty food cups. These things take forever to scrub by hand and still come out feeling not fully clean so I've just been letting all dishes pile up. This is a great time saver. It somehow does work to do the heavy scrubbing for you.You need to rinse them after, obviously the water doesn't get magically clean that they wash in. Some need a light wipe down as well, especially if it's a item that got nestled in another. But this is tons better than the intense scrubbing I would have had to do.My second load was a bunch of plastic containers and lids. It worked well but they tended to nestle together a bit more than the cups. Washing none fitting together items obviously will work better. Like your dinner dishes.I also threw a dirty metal dog bowl in. It got it clean of food but did not remove the calcification from past hardwater use, which I didn't expect it to but seems worth mentioning.Bonus it also deodorizes the plastics even ones I could not get smell out of by soaking and scrubbing before.The only down side I have is the suction cups just aren't strong enough. The vibrations make it slowly move to the top and I need to rush over to push it back down to stop water splashing. I will try to find a solution, maybe a giant clamp.It is also noisy but it's not terrible.I have not used for clothes since I do not need it for that. I was also very liberal with the dish soap and used only hot water. This still did way more than soaking without the washer in it ever has.So recap is if you only need to lightly wash dishes then this may not be for you since you still need to rinse and sometimes lightly wipe the dishes. However if you need to really scrub and deep clean things then this is great and saves time. Does the major work, removes odor and did also get rid of any greasy feeling.Tips. Be liberal with the soap so it really suds up and use hot water. Don't go to big with the container. You may need to find a better way to keep the washer in place on the side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 2 months.
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I waited before writing this review. When I first received this product it worked well. I mainly use it to pre wash underwear before putting in the washing machine. It did great at first. 2 months later… it’s just vibrating smh It stop turning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: It isn't the best. I used it maybe 5 times and I followed the directions and instructions and it still broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Used for dishwashing
reviews.reviewText: I will preface this by saying I’m not using for clothes, but for rinsing dishes prior to loading into the dishwasher. I figured I would give it a try. The first thing I noticed out of the box was that the remote that is supposed to be on the cord to select the speed isn’t there. This is just a plug in and go type of device so you cannot change the settings. It’s not quiet, but you can’t really expect it to be that quiet anyways. The dishes came out nicely rinsed but I’m not sure how much that had to do with soaking in soapy water or the actual washer. The “ultrasonic” is just the device vibrating. Nothing that will actually loosen dirt. I’m not over-joyed with the purchase, but it’s not worth returning since I may use it when my depression flares to help with the dishes still. At least it swirls the water…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke second use
reviews.reviewText: Was disappointed from the moment I tried it. I followed the directions to the letter, even going out and buying the appropriate bucket. I washed a single sock at first. The machine didn't agitate anything but me. I wondered if it was too small of a load, so one by one, I added just small socks, removed them, tried other clothes, nothing... All it did was shake my house and give me a migraine. I ended up hand washing all of my clothes. The second (and last) time, I put a couple boxers and socks in the bucket, filled it up with soapy water and the device, and almost instantly, I heard a mechanical snap and water flew everywhere. The top, rotating part of the device sheared off, FLYING out of the bucket, hitting my bathroom mirror, chipping it! Doubt the seller is going to refund me the $550 I need to replace the mirror, so the best I can do is warn others... DO NOT BUY!!! It may be a bit pricier, but just buy a hand crank washing device, they're about $70 on here, even with inflation. And these jerks have the audacity to require the device back, inconveniencing me and my husband because of their bad product... When they can't and SHOULDN'T try to fix and resell it. Dudes... Just refund me. I'll be calling Amazon for such a request. After they see these pics... Do you think I'm lying?Less than 1 star for both the product and the seller. Be and feel ashamed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Tried it out in the kitchenette sink at a hotel tonight. Works as advertised!!! We were looking at small portable washers for our camper and came across this one, for the price we were very skeptical but figured we could return it if it didn’t work….. we will not be returning it!!! Only down side I could see is if trying to use it in a tub, plugging it in might be challenging. We washed a dirty and yellowed white fleece hat on the test run and with a little bit of dish detergent it came out super white in just a couple of minutes. Definitely worth the money in my book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to like this!
reviews.reviewText: It did not stay attached to the side of a circular bucket as pictured. Attaching to the bottom of bucket did work however the washcloths became tangled on the cord, only 1 suction cup to secure cord down. Unit did not run 30 minutes as advertised. My unit buzzed, turned on in less than 3 minutes the unit vibrated, not stopping to change directions. Returning the unit, great concept, execution is not there.
